org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas

Interface CasGappedReferenceDataStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, DataStore<NucleotideSequence>, NucleotideSequenceDataStore

    public interface CasGappedReferenceDataStore
extends NucleotideSequenceDataStore
    CasGappedReferenceDataStore is a NucleotideSequenceDataStore that stores the gapped reference sequences that were computed from a cas file along with a mapping from the internal cas file reference indexes to the actual reference ids from the input reference file.
    Author:
    dkatzel
    See Also:
    CasGappedReferenceDataStoreBuilderVisitor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getIdByIndex(long index)
      Get the real reference id that is used to identify the reference sequence in the original input into the CLC assembler.
      Long getIndexById(String id)
      Get the cas internal reference index from the real reference id that is used to identify the reference sequence in the original input into the CLC assembler.
      NucleotideSequence getReferenceByIndex(long index)
      This method get the NucleotideSequence for the gapped assembled reference by the cas internal reference index.

    • Method Detail

      • getReferenceByIndex

        NucleotideSequence getReferenceByIndex(long index)
                                throws DataStoreException
        This method get the NucleotideSequence for the gapped assembled reference by the cas internal reference index. The cas file does not use the reference ids from the input reference file(s), instead it uses an internal numbering scheme to keep the filesize as small as possible.
        Parameters:
        index - the cas internal reference index to use; should be ≥ 0.
        Returns:
        the NucleotideSequence for that reference index; or null if the index does not exist.
        Throws:
        DataStoreException - if there was a problem getting the sequence from the datastore.

      • getIdByIndex

        String getIdByIndex(long index)
        Get the real reference id that is used to identify the reference sequence in the original input into the CLC assembler.
        Parameters:
        index - index the cas internal reference index to use; should be ≥ 0.
        Returns:
        the String id for that reference index; or null if the index does not exist.

      • getIndexById

        Long getIndexById(String id)
        Get the cas internal reference index from the real reference id that is used to identify the reference sequence in the original input into the CLC assembler.
        Parameters:
        id - the reference id from the input file(s) given to the CLC assembler.
        Returns:
        the cas internal reference index as a long should be ≥ 0; or null if that id does not exist in the datastore.
